verses.text_plain: So king Solomon was king over all Israel.
verses.verse_html: 1So king Solomon was king over all Israel.

verses.text_plain: And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,
verses.verse_html:
2And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest, ▼
▼ priest: or, chief officer

footnotes.body_html: ▼ priest: or, chief officer

verses.text_plain: Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.
verses.verse_html:
3Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder. ▼
▼ scribes: or, secretaries
 , ▼
▼ recorder: or, remembrancer

verses.text_plain: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:
verses.verse_html: 4And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:

verses.text_plain: And Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan was principal officer, and the king’s friend:
verses.verse_html: 5And Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan was principal officer, and the king’s friend:

verses.text_plain: And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute.
verses.verse_html:
6And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute. ▼
▼ tribute: or, levy

verses.text_plain: And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.
verses.verse_html: 7And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.

verses.text_plain: And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:
verses.verse_html:
8And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim: ▼
▼ The son…: or, Ben–hur

footnotes.body_html: ▼ The son…: or, Ben–hur

verses.text_plain: The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Beth–shemesh, and Elon–beth–hanan:
verses.verse_html:
9The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Beth–shemesh, and Elon–beth–hanan: ▼
▼ The son…: or, Ben–dekar

footnotes.body_html: ▼ The son…: or, Ben–dekar

verses.text_plain: The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:
verses.verse_html:
10The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher: ▼
▼ The son…: or, Ben–hesed

footnotes.body_html: ▼ The son…: or, Ben–hesed

verses.text_plain: The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
verses.verse_html:
11The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife: ▼
▼ The son…: or, Ben–abinadab

footnotes.body_html: ▼ The son…: or, Ben–abinadab

verses.text_plain: Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Beth–shean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Beth–shean to Abel–meholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:
verses.verse_html: 12Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Beth–shean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Beth–shean to Abel–meholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:

verses.text_plain: The son of Geber, in Ramoth–gilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:
verses.verse_html:
13The son of Geber, in Ramoth–gilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars: ▼
▼ The son…: or, Ben–geber

footnotes.body_html: ▼ The son…: or, Ben–geber

verses.text_plain: Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim:
verses.verse_html:
14Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim: ▼
▼ Mahanaim: or, to Mahanaim

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Mahanaim: or, to Mahanaim

verses.text_plain: Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
verses.verse_html: 15Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:

verses.text_plain: Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:
verses.verse_html: 16Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:

verses.text_plain: Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:
verses.verse_html: 17Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:

verses.text_plain: Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:
verses.verse_html: 18Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:

verses.text_plain: Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.
verses.verse_html: 19Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.

verses.text_plain: Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.
verses.verse_html: 20Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.
verses.verse_html: 21And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon’s provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,
verses.verse_html:
22And Solomon’s provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal, ▼
▼ provision: Heb. bread
 , ▼
▼ measures: Heb. cors

verses.text_plain: Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.
verses.verse_html: 23Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.

verses.text_plain: For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.
verses.verse_html: 24For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.

verses.text_plain: And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beer–sheba, all the days of Solomon.
verses.verse_html:
25And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beer–sheba, all the days of Solomon. ▼
▼ safely: Heb. confidently

verses.text_plain: And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.
verses.verse_html: 26And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.

verses.text_plain: And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon’s table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.
verses.verse_html: 27And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon’s table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.

verses.text_plain: Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.
verses.verse_html:
28Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge. ▼
▼ dromedaries: or, mules, or, swift beasts

footnotes.body_text: ▼ dromedaries: or, mules, or, swift beasts
footnotes.body_html: ▼ dromedaries: or, mules, or, swift beasts

verses.text_plain: And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.
verses.verse_html: 29And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon’s wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.
verses.verse_html: 30And Solomon’s wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.

verses.text_plain: For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.
verses.verse_html: 31For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.

verses.text_plain: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.
verses.verse_html: 32And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.

verses.text_plain: And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.
verses.verse_html: 33And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.

verses.text_plain: And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
verses.verse_html: 34And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
